description.value:
The Iron General is the consummate warrior and those with his favor gain a measure of his tactical genius.

Alternative Reward: Divine Boon - Uncommon

Property:

Whenever you roll a natural 19 or 20 for an attack roll using a weapon, one ally within 5 squares of you can shift 1 square as a free action.

Level 13: The ally shifts up to 2 squares.

Level 23: One ally within 5 squares of you can shift up to 2 squares as a free action, or two allies within 5 squares of you can each shift 1 square as a free action.

Power - Daily (Free Action)

Trigger: You roll initiative.

Effect: You can slide each ally within 5 squares of you 1 square.

Level 13: Slide up to 2 squares.

Level 23: Slide up to 3 squares.
